mapper.update: UPDATE student_course sc JOIN pre_course pc ON pc.course_id = sc.course_id JOIN class c ON c.course_id = pc.pre_course_id SET num_of_completed_pre_course = num_of_completed_pre_course + 1 WHERE c.id = #{class_id} AND sc.student_id = #{student_id} AND sc.status = 0 AND c.status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT s.year, s.semester, c.id AS course_id, c.course, sc.final_grade, sc.final_attendance, sc.status FROM student_course sc JOIN course c ON c.id = sc.course_id LEFT JOIN semester s ON s.id = sc.semester_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{student_id}
SELECT sc.student_id, sc.course_id, c.course FROM student_course sc JOIN course c ON c.id = sc.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{student_id} AND sc.status = 1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM student_course WHERE student_id = #{student_id} AND course_id = #{course_id} AND status = 1
